Around Black Friday 2023, TikTok shut down THOUSANDS of small business shops on its platform without warning. Yes, those small TikTok businesses that SarahGrace, HopeScope, Mia Maples, and other creators love to buy from and make haul videos about every week... they're GONE! It sounds kind of shady and downright disturbing, right? But what if we told you TikTok just saved those small businesses MILLIONS of dollars? Hereâ€™s the lowdown on the TikTok Shop scandalâ€¦
